body:
Comment 1: 
Confirmed.

This file:
--
package foo                                                                     
                                                                                
import (                                                                        
        "bufio"                                                                 
        "bytes"                                                                 
        "net"                                                                   
        "net/url"                                                               
        "os"                                                                    
        "runtime/debug"                                                         
)                                                                               
                                                                                
var _ = os.NewError("Foo")
--
becomes
--
package foo                                                                     
                                                                                
import (                                                                        
        "bufio"                                                                 
        "bytes"                                                                 
        "errors"                                                                
        "net"                                                                   
        "net/url"                                                               
                                                                                
        "runtime/debug"                                                         
)                                                                               
                                                                                
var _ = errors.New("Foo")    
--
when gofixed at tip.
_Labels changed: added **priority-go1**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @rsc._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
